messages.message:
i am creating a full-platform demo for Kering
While creating a workspace, creating a build project, deploy it & want to add a Human-Review group, i find it a little irritating that there is a link saying: create a group here (with a link) and the link leads to the Kering Workspace, but without a “create Group” button.
If i dont have created a group already, I need to klick on members, click on group, create a group and add people.
If i have a group, i still dont know that i need to click on “add members”

my suggestion: either a direct create group button in the workspace settings OR the link from the deployment leads direct to create groups.

Hope its clear.
Yep definitely clear, we assume that your group already exists here. Thanks for the feedback! @jack.robbins @Udit
